name: Cops Cars | Robber Police Car Racing Game for Free
name_original: Cops Cars | Robber Police Car Racing Game for Free
description:
Day by day the city is becoming more dangerous. It depends on your driving ability to keep the criminals away. Can you become the fastest police car driver ever?

Be ready, because when you receive a call from the central office, you have to run out to catch the thieves. Leave the police car engine started because there is no time to lose!

- Police sirens and lights
- Perfect for children
- Funny sounds
- Accomplish the missions to get better police cars
- Endless car races
- Easy controls

Download now the last police cars racing game and catch all the thieves in town!

And if you like the game, give us 5 stars so we can keep bringing you more fun games!

Twitter: @bravocterogames
Facebook: www.facebook.com/bravocterogames
